title: HOUR 2- Dick Vitale Sep 10, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 2- Dick Vitale Sep 10, 2020
description:
Dick Vitale tells Dan that he is not on board with letting all the NCAA Div 1 teams into the March Madness. Dick says he really expects a smaller March Madness bracket of teams.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
